title: Introducing: Wales
content:
Wales aka Samuel Aaron Bennett doesn’t have your stereotypical musical bio, especially not for a musician hailing from Brooklyn, the Mecca of new sounds.

Having been trained by the crew of Sesame Street (by crew I mean the production crew, not Big Bird, Elmo etc.) for a production role on PBS’s It’s a Big Big World, he’s aided with composing music for brands ranging from Facebook to CoverGirl. Having put out a Bandcamp release of compositions and scores back in 2010, these two tracks are his first foray under the Wales moniker. Considered, elegant and bewitchingly inviting, lead track Go is a blog-hit in waiting, whereas Still Gone, which featured on his previous release, is a more traditional acoustic number. Based on the strength of these tracks, perhaps it’s time for Bennett to focus on writing music for himself, as oppose to for films. Taste Wales below.
